title: Gamified Learning Program for Improving VR-Based Spatial Visualization Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and foundational spatial awareness understanding
context.additional_context: Due to managerial roles requiring multidimensional problem-solving, spatial reasoning training linked to language domains is necessary

learning_goals: Learners achieve a 30% improvement in Spatial Visualization Ability Test (SVAT) scores through a 6-week VR gamified training program
Learners can perform real-time rotation, symmetry, and decomposition tasks of 3D objects with over 80% accuracy
Learners demonstrate cognitive load management skills, evidenced by a 15% increase in prefrontal hemoglobin oxygenation (HbO) in fNIRS-based neurocognitive measurements

resources: Portable fNIRS Brain Activity Measurement Device

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
